skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

effects.description: Mount: Chaos Steed

skillTree.localised_description: A vast, mobile altar allows the souls of the slain to be ritualistically condemned directly from the field of slaughter.

effects.description: Mount: Warshrine

skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%
Weapon strength: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +40%

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: Magic and Chaos are eternally intertwined in a symbiotic storm of malevolent power.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +3 per turn
	(Lord's army)

Miscast base chance: +15% for all enemy spellcasters
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Magic need not only wreak havoc at rangeâ€”half the fun of battle, after all, is seeing the fear in your enemy's eyes.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5
Melee defence: +7

skillTree.localised_description: The Forsaken heed the commands of the powerful, and thrive on the excess of their energy.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Forsaken, Chaos Spawn and Chaos Feral Manticore units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Forsaken
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those bearing the mark of Nurgle exude a sickening miasma wherever they go.

effects.description: Ability: "Locus of Virulence"

skillTree.localised_description: The armies of Nurgle find strength in decay, bolstered by their own festering wounds.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.localised_description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(all units in army)
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates â€“ lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

Melee attack: +4 for all non-Daemonic infantry units

skillTree.localised_description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

skillTree.localised_description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +4% for all non-Daemonic war beasts, monstrous and monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Subdue the enemy with savage fire, as flaming projectiles burn a trail across the sky.

skillTree.localised_description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 20% for all infantry units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to move faster for longer.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all cavalry, chariots and flying units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

skillTree.localised_description: To devastate one's enemies from afar is the key to controlling the battlefield.

Armour: +10 for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for all missile units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)
Ability: "Stand or Die!"

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

effects.description:
Income from raiding: +10%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +20%
	(Lord's army)

Income from sacking settlements: +5%
	(Lord's army)

Income from raiding: +30%
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +100%

Undivided Authority: +1
	(own army)
Passive ability: "Battle Banner"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.

effects.description: Enables flaming attacks
Fire resistance: 50%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A Chaos Familiar memorises spells on its master's behalf, constantly rehearsing for its big moment until it is called upon to share its arcane knowledge.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to all spells

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -25%
Charge bonus: +50

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.

effects.description: Campaign line of sight: +50%

	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.
